headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: Documentally opens his digital kit bag, plus DLD 2013
text: This week on Tech Weekly, Guardian digital correspondent Jemima Kiss meets the skilled digital journalist Christian Payne best known by his twitter name @documentally. Christian opens up his kit bag and discusses everything from multi-plugs and pro cameras, the tools of his storytelling trade. Jemima also reports on the DLD13 conference that took place in Munich this week. She meets data scientist DJ Patil from the venture capital group Greylock Partners and discusses the ever growing importance of data technologies in the world economy. And we have a roundup of this week's tech news. The music featured in this edition is by Alex Ronin aka Local Spirit.
